    Ordinary Skin Care Routine For Dry and Dehydrated Skin

    Written by Aayusha on 11 Sep 2020

    The ordinary skincare products have specific skin care routine for dry and dehydrated skin. There treatments offer an effective clinical technologies that help you build amazing skin care routine.

    Skin Care Routines are simple to make and follow. It is a combination of simple steps, cleanse, tone, antioxidant serums, moisturizers, and sunscreen. Ordinary has a huge range of ordinary products with active ingredients that target dry skin. Let’s take a dig at Ordinary Skin Care Routine for dry and dehydrated skin.

    Ordinary Skin Care Routine for dry and dehydrated skin for AM

    1. Cleanse
    2. Buffet + Copper Peptides 1%
    3. Hydrating Toner or Essence
    4. Eye Treatment
    5. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
    6. EUK 134 0.1%
    7. Natural Moisturising Factors + HA
    8. Mineral UV Filters SPF 30 with Antioxidants
    9. High Spreadability Fluid Primer
    10. Serum Foundation

    Ordinary Skin Care Routine for dry and dehydrated skin for PM

    1. Double Cleanse - Squalene Clenser
    2. Buffet + Copper Peptides 1%
    3. Eye Product
    4. Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
    5. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
    6. Granactive Retinoid 5% in Squalane
    7. Natural Moisturising Factors + HA
    8. 100% Organic Cold Press Natural Moroccan Oil

    Skin Care routine for dry skin may include AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution for weekly treatment.

    About Aayusha I am a skin care enthusiast making my way foward to having a healthy skin and helping others by sharing what i know.
